keyMoments.title: Giant Squad Attempts to Stop Little Oars Jr.
keyMoments.description: The Marine Giant Squad, including Vice Admiral Lacroix, is forced to leave their defensive positions to attack Little Oars Jr., but he defeats them with relative ease.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even the Marines' elite giant forces are insufficient against the overwhelming power of Little Oars Jr.

description: The Marines' Giant Squad and other forces defend Marineford Bay and the execution platform during this episode.

keyMoments.title: Little Oars Jr. Opens Path for Whitebeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: Little Oars Jr. throws a Marine battleship and opens a critical pathway through Marineford Bay for the Whitebeard Pirates to advance.
keyMoments.significance: Provides a strategic advantage for the Whitebeard Pirates in their assault on the execution platform.

description: The Whitebeard Pirates and their allied crews continue their assault on Marineford, with Little Oars Jr. leading the charge.
